name: Inside The Wall
description:
A tiny RTS about creating and breaking connections.

INSTRUCTIONS:

Connect buildings to sources to provide them with power.

- LMB + drag creates a connection.

- RMB + drag deletes a connection.

Any building that loses power is automatically destroyed.

Powered buildings provide a continuous effect over time, but also an initial burst.

Hover over the buildings to see their concrete descriptions.

- Z: toggle the instructions.

- R: restart the game.

- Esc: quit the game.

------------------------

Made during the GMKT Game Jam 2021.
